channel.title: Legalize Marijuana
channel.description:
I thought this would be an interesting debate :D
I think there is some proof out there that legalized drugs, i.e. Marijuana, won't cause social chaos, such as in the Netherlands, where such soft drugs as this are legal to some extent [cant smoke + drive, stuff like that].
Right now though, im undecided as to whether it should be legalized or not, because as soon as its legal, most people are going to go crazy and start smoking a LOT of pot until the excitement of being allowed to 'take a cookie from mom's cookie jar', so to speak, wears off.
once at that stage i believe that there will we a lot less pot smokers in the country.
idk, what are your ideas [should have posted this yesterday >.<]

OFF TOPIC : I’m on replying because I’m KeyLogging my self to see if it works :P, K, Bye.
[/quote]

why would you say that? lol…

Anyways, on/off topic…

I hear that if you smoke (if possible) your body weight in weed, thats how weed can literally cause death. In other words. smoking your body weight in marijuana can kill you. anyone know if that is true?[/quote]

It can be true afaik, and you would have to smoke it in a rediculously quick time.

I’m a small guy, I can’t imagine smoking 140 pounds of weed. Do you have any idea how much that is. It really is impossible to do it.

item.title: Legalize Marijuana
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

jme:

And responsible for deaths? What deaths. Marijuana has never, ever, been directly responsible for any persons death.

Exactly why i put deaths in quotes. I didn’t mean it literally, its just blamed because the effects cause you to do stupid shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Legalize Marijuana
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:239, topic:1736”][quote author=jcs_double link=topic=1782.msg16509#msg16509 date=1145669420]
i think the only reason marijuana was banned because they couldn’t tax it
[/quote]
That sums it up.

Of course alcohol is “better”. It has more effect and is more dangerous.

rofl? if only it was legal for me to feel the rush ;][/quote]

Why can’t they tax it? Of course they could, and they could make a fortune from it too. That tax money would be returned to us with the services the government provides (health care/schools/etc). Not everyone has the time and resources for growing plants, and not everyone knows someone else who does. It takes a lot of work to get a good end-product. So it’s not like everyone is just going to grow it and never buy it. Otherwise tobacco would be illegal right now.

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:241, topic:1736”][quote author=army_life link=topic=1782.msg2407949#msg2407949 date=1219790550]
Not really, They could just sell it in stores and ban it for growing they would still make a profit on lazy people who don’t want/don’t know how to grow there own
[/quote]
Never really thought about it that way. Still all sounds like a bullshit system though ;] Funny thing is, if that happened, it might lower the cases of drug busts from marijuana. too bad it gets you high and is ‘responsible’ for deaths =[/quote]

Yes and drug gangs couldn’t exist either if the government regulated the drugs. Theres no reason for it to be illegal other than the fact that if it remained legal, DuPont could never have made billions and billion of dollars from paper and pulp/plastic/oil/clothing.

And responsible for deaths? What deaths. Marijuana has never, ever, been directly responsible for any persons death.

Read full topic
